Location.Message: Extension generation for NestedInGenericClass is disabled because it is nested in a generic type

Descriptor.Title: Invalid nesting type
Descriptor.Description: Please define your enum outside a generic type.
Descriptor.MessageFormat: Extension generation for {0} is disabled because it is nested in a generic type

Location.Message: Extension generation for PrivateEnum is disabled because it has an unsupported visibility modifier

Descriptor.Title: Invalid visibility modifier
Descriptor.Description: Current generation strategy does not support extension generation for enums with `protected`, `protected internal` or `private` visibility modifiers.
Descriptor.MessageFormat: Extension generation for {0} is disabled because it has an unsupported visibility modifier
